title: panic: deadlock detected at fmut

labels.name: bug
labels.description: A problem with current functionality, as opposed to missing functionality (enhancement)

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

milestone.title: v1.13.0
milestone.description: This release adds configuration options for min/max connections (see https://docs.syncthing.net/advanced/option-connection-limits.html) and moves the storage of pending devices/folders from the config to the database (see https://docs.syncthing.net/dev/rest.html#cluster-endpoints).

body:
Possibly related to https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing/issues/7230, but not sure. It happened 15 minutes before the other panics. The cause is unknown, but I was maybe trying to pause and resume a folder at that time.

```
[D4DZU] 18:55:26 INFO: Failed to exchange Hello messages with CWXZ7CV-XXXXXXX-XXXXXXX-XXXXXXX-XXXXXXX-XXXXXXX-XXXXXXX-XXXXXXX at [::]:22000-178.42.98.249:22000/quic-server/TLS1.3-TLS_AES_128_GCM_SHA256: Application error 0x0: closing
Panic at 2020-12-24T19:08:28+09:00
panic: deadlock detected at fmut

goroutine 58 [running]:
github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/model.(*deadlockDetector).Watch.func1(0x12c60ff0, 0x32f86fd8, 0x12baa720, 0xd961dc, 0x4)
	github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/model/util.go:61 +0x2b4
created by github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/model.(*deadlockDetector).Watch
	github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/model/util.go:37 +0x93

goroutine 1 [chan receive, 55 minutes]:
github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/syncthing.(*App).Wait(...)
	github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/syncthing/syncthing.go:370
main.syncthingMain(0x12a58700, 0x1f, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x1, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, ...)
	github.com/syncthing/syncthing/cmd/syncthing/main.go:719 +0x59f
main.main()
	github.com/syncthing/syncthing/cmd/syncthing/main.go:438 +0x33b
```

[panic-20201224-190828.log](https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing/files/5739282/panic-20201224-190828.log)

Syncthing v1.12.0.

**Edit**: Just for the record, I have found the older issue (https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing/issues/6076), but this here is not a slow device.
